sentences.en: "Was the car inside the garage?" — "No, it was still outside."
a house with a built-in garage
Ben drove past them, nosing his car into the garage.
sentences.cn: 本小心翼翼地把车开进车库时从他们身边经过。

sentences.en: He emerged from the dark recesses of the garage.
sentences.cn: 他从车库的暗处走出来。

sentences.en: He pulled into the driveway in front of her garage.
sentences.cn: 他把车停在了她家车库前的车道上。

sentences.en: I had had my car serviced at the local garage.
sentences.cn: 我已经把我的车送到当地汽修厂检修了。

sentences.en: I have a battery tester in my garage.
sentences.cn: 我的车库里有台电池测试仪。

sentences.en: I’ll just go and put the car in the garage.
Measure your garage: how high is the door?
sentences.cn: 量一量你的车库：门有多高？
我的车正放在汽修厂修理。

sentences.en: Nelson Garage has the used car you're after.
sentences.cn: 纳尔逊汽车修理厂有你要找的那种二手车。

sentences.en: The boy's ball ended up on the garage roof.
sentences.cn: 这男孩的球落到了汽车库顶上.

sentences.en: The car knocked against the garage door and damaged it.
sentences.cn: 汽车撞在车房门上,把门撞坏了.

sentences.en: The car was too big to fit into our garage.
sentences.cn: 这部车太大了，我们的车库放不下。

sentences.en: The poor cat has been enclosed in the garage all night.
sentences.cn: 这只可怜的猫在汽车库被关了一整夜.

sentences.en: They picked up Oliver and carried him shoulder high into the garage.
sentences.cn: 他们把奥利弗抬了起来，齐肩举着进入了车库。

phrases.tran_cn: 宅前旧货出售；在私家车库进行的家中旧货出售

trans.tran_cn: 车库，汽车修理厂，车库音乐
trans.tran_en: a building for keeping a car in, usually next to or attached to a house
to put or keep a vehicle in a garage
